message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SY, cs.SE, cs.AI, cs.NI 

The paper focuses on the security of the Controller Area Network (CAN) in vehicles, which is a communication protocol used by Electronic Control Units (ECUs). This topic falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) and system and control (cs.SY). The proposed intrusion detection system (IDS) is based on entropy analysis, which involves statistical analysis of data, making it relevant to sub-categories such as software engineering (cs.SE), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and networking and internet architecture (cs.NI).
